text:
[Verse]
Woke up in the morning
Sunshine on my face
Candy-colored skies
Starting up the chase

[Verse]
Walking down the street now
Pavement glitter bright
Every step I take
Dancing in the light

[Chorus]
Bubblegum dreams
Popping in my heart
Sweetest little spark
We'll never be apart

[Verse]
Found a hidden park
Swings that fly so high
Cotton candy clouds
Up into the sky

[Verse]
Stars begin to glow
Nighttime's coming soon
Fireflies around
Dancing with the moon

[Chorus]
Bubblegum dreams
Popping in my heart
Sweetest little spark
We'll never be apart
title: Bubblegum Dreams
